A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Painfully bad. Mary Poppins in space. A Casino scene that should’ve been in the extended version. Arms dealing? Really? This movie was bad for a the same reasons Phantom Menace was bad. Preachy and boring. I can honestly say not only is this The Last Jedi but it’s also the last Star Wars I’ll ever see in this trilogy. Hopefully they do a prequel with Ewen McGregor as Obi Wan\, but other than that I’m done.
